appDesc.message: Automatically redirects failed site connections to the Menlo Security URL.

popupDesc.message: When a website fails to connect, it automatically reconnects through Menlo Security.

forceMenloListTitle.message: Always Open with Menlo URL List
forceMenloListTitle.description: Title for the force menlo list

newUrlInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the new URL input

openWithMenloBtn.description: Button to immediately open the current page via Menlo Security.

urlAlreadyExists.message: This URL is already in the list.
urlAlreadyExists.description: Error message when adding a duplicate URL

urlFormatInvalid.description: Error message for invalid URL format

urlCannotRedirect.description: Error when the current page is not a redirectable URL (e.g. settings page).
